name: Beyond the stars: Ratsteroid
description:
New version: If you want to see what's new on each version, check changelog for 0.5.1!

Your ship is broken and you're stranded in an asteroid, those rats are the keys to get out from that place.

Controls are easy:

  • W A S D - Move character
  • Left click - Fire
  • G - Fire Grenade
  • H - Fire special grenade
  • J - Drop actual weapon
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Run

Included music:

Main Menu:

  • Kirkegard - Lost in space

In Game

  • Arnoldsrecords - Jours_anciens
  • Dream about space - Александр Желанов
  • Music For Your Media - 316_Breaking Worst
  • Alexandr Zhelanov - Second Stand
  • Clearside - Dark Electronic/Rock/Sci-Fi Rock Clearside - Siste Viator
  • HorrorPen - Almost Out
  • ARHIPCO - Warmens
  • Kirkegard - The storm
  • Kirkegard - Wake Me Up
